name: Minecraft
description: Are you a fan of Minecraft? Test your knowledge!

down-B0.hint: A common mob; a villager will become one if attacked by this.

down-G0.hint: One of the hardest blocks; made my pouring water on lava; requires a diamond (or better) pickaxe to mine.

down-G12.hint: Bows and crossbows shoot these; ammunition.

down-H7.hint: Can be thrown at mobs (and players) if they don't hatch first.

down-I0.hint: If you throw this Ender item it will teleport you to wherever it lands.

down-I12.hint: This mob flies around at night and will swoop down and hit you from behind; drops a Membrane when defeated.

down-J4.hint: Drinking this will remove all status effects; can be stored in a bucket or a bottle.

down-M0.hint: A sharp weapon good for oofing mobs.

down-N9.hint: A creepy dude who only attacks you if you look into his purple eyes.

down-P13.hint: A pet that brings you weird items in the morning; likes fish; Creepers hate this pet.

down-Q8.hint: A Flint and Steel is used to do this to items like TNT and Nether Portals; setting things on fire

down-Q17.hint: A chubby animal that you can ride if you put an apple at the end of a fishing rod.

down-K9.hint: A dark place to mine, where mobs spawn.

down-L4.hint: A dark, creepy, hot place where the Hoglins and Zoglins roam free and Striders walk across the oceans of lava.

down-L15.hint: A block that is only valuable because you need it to make Netherite Ingots.

down-C8.hint: A rare place deep inside most caves where loot is found and also poisonous Cave Spiders.

down-R3.hint: A rare piece of treasure that can only be found in an End City Ship; gives you the ability to fly (glide, really).

down-R14.hint: A green fruit that can be cut into slices with Shears; Water______.

down-S8.hint: A useful item used to make strong armor and tools; Blocks of this can be used to make an Anvil or a Golem.

down-T3.hint: There are two types of this: one that takes you to the Nether or to the End.

down-T14.hint: Can be used as fireworks or to fly with Elytra.

down-A5.hint: Swimming in this will destroy you and whatever you are wearing; Having a bucket of water helps to deal with this obstacle.

down-A11.hint: One of the Piglin's favorite weapons; sort of like a Bow; shoots arrows.

down-E7.hint: A large natural structure; usually has snow on top.

down-E16.hint: An attack by Pillagers that is announced by the sound of a horn; Pillagers attack in waves.

across-F0.hint: One of these mobs protects villages; can be made with blocks of Iron.

across-M0.hint: A green mob that bounces and drops a bouncy green block when it is defeated.

across-G2.hint: An annoying mob made of white bones who uses a Bow and Arrows; a darker version uses a stone sword and inflicts Wither when it hits you.

across-B3.hint: A passive mob that lives in caves and flies away if you place a torch near it.

across-P3.hint: The fastest way to turn night into day.

across-G4.hint: The second strongest type of tool in the game.

across-A5.hint: Another word for "leash", used by traders to keep their llamas from roaming off.

across-L6.hint: A structure made of blocks built up high.

across-E7.hint: One of the main activities the player can do in Minecraft; the best way to get valuable ore.

across-A8.hint: The only way to hit your enemy with an arrow from far away is to do this.

across-Q8.hint: The best way to tell if a Wolf is healthy is to look at this part of it.

across-K9.hint: The most annoying creature in all of Minecraft, known for whispering "BOOM" in your ear when you least expect it.

across-A11.hint: A useful block to put other items in.

across-N11.hint: There is only one type of this mob in the whole game and it flies.

across-G12.hint: If turned into gold, it can be used to help turn a Zombie villager back into a regular villager.

across-L13.hint: A type of dark brown tree that can grow in regular form or a large form if its saplings are placed in a 2x2 square arrangement.

across-A14.hint: A creepy little block with a flame in the middle and spits out a specific mob; often found in caves.

across-P14.hint: Wearing this makes it difficult for mobs to oof you; made of leather, gold, iron, diamond or Netherite.

across-L15.hint: A ghost squid that hates you for being you and reminds you that it hates you by squealing and shooting a fireball at your forehead.

across-C16.hint: A Drowned will do this with its trident when it can't get your attention by shouting... while underwater.

across-Q17.hint: Defeating a Hoglin with a flaming weapon will drop this food already cooked for you.

across-L18.hint: A friendly sea creature that will show you where to find underwater treasure in exchange for salmon.

across-B19.hint: A handy-dandy weapon that can be used in hand or thrown; not the greatest fork for eating salad.
